dialog.text:
What is your name, for crediting purposes?
This will be stored in the scenario but cannot easily be changed later.

What is the name of your new scenario? (max. length 30 characters)
Examples: 'Hammer of Thor', 'Dragon's Quest'
Is your outdoors going to be above ground? If so, the default outdoors will have grass instead of cave floor. (Click on the button to the left to have the outdoors be grass.)
